metadata.title: CVE-2020-36310 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.8.arch/x86/kvm/svm/svm.c allows a set_memory_region_test infinite loop forcertain nested page faults, aka CID-e72436bc3a52.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36310` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic-64k - 5.15.0-22.22
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-kvm - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1009-aws - 5.15.0-1002.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-azure - 5.15.0-1001.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-gcp - 5.15.0-1001.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-oracle - 5.15.0-1001.3
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-1004-raspi - 5.15.0-1003.3
linux-image-5.19.0-1004-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-ibm - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required
